lead_paragraph: “Global Beat of the Bronx: From Bambara to Breakbeats,” at Lincoln Center, showcased lively dance troupes from New York’s northernmost borough.

headline.print_headline: The Dancer as Drummer: Traditions From the Bronx
headline.main: Heritage Sunday, Where the Dancer Is the Drummer

snippet: “Global Beat of the Bronx: From Bambara to Breakbeats,” at Lincoln Center, showcased lively dance troupes from New York’s northernmost borough....
abstract: Siobhan Burke reviews Lincoln Center Out of Doors program Global Beat of the Bronx: From Bambara to Breakbeats, featuring performances by Bronx-based dance troupes Bombazo Dance Company, Chief Joseph Chatoyer Dance Company, Bambara Drum and Dance Ensemble and Full Circle Souljahs, at Hearst Plaza.
